Question: Shenzhen Cyrusher Technology CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Cyrusher Technology

Product: Cyrusher Electric Bicycles and Other Electric Vehicles

- Specialized e-bike collection, including fat tire electric bikes
- Electric skateboards, snowboards, and surfboards
- Emphasis on sustainability and eco-friendly entertainment
- Exhibit date: Jan. 9th - Jan. 12th, 2024
- Booth No. 10063 at LVCC - North Hall, Convention Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89109, United States
